offer.title: Brake Special
offer.details: Includes front brake pads with installation. Reg. price varies.
offer.disclaimer: Must be presented at time of write-up. Not valid with any other offers or in-store specials. Does not include sales tax and hazardous waste disposal fees ($5.65). Not retroactive. No cash value. See dealer for details. Limit one coupon per person. Coupon does not apply to prior purchases. Void where prohibited. See your service professional at Beverly Hills BMW for details.
